resource-agent.name: fence_gce
resource-agent.shortdesc: Fence agent for GCE (Google Cloud Engine)
resource-agent.longdesc: fence_gce is a Power Fencing agent for GCE (Google Cloud Engine). It uses the googleapiclient library to connect to GCE. googleapiclient can be configured with Google SDK CLI or by executing 'gcloud auth application-default login'. For instructions see: https://cloud.google.com/compute/docs/tutorials/python-guide

parameter.name: action
parameter.shortdesc: Fencing action

parameter.name: method
parameter.shortdesc: Method to fence

parameter.name: plug
parameter.shortdesc: Physical plug number on device, UUID or identification of machine

parameter.name: port
parameter.shortdesc: Physical plug number on device, UUID or identification of machine

parameter.name: zone
parameter.shortdesc: Zone.

parameter.name: project
parameter.shortdesc: Project ID.

parameter.name: stackdriver-logging
parameter.shortdesc: Stackdriver-logging support.

parameter.name: stackdriver_logging
parameter.shortdesc: Stackdriver-logging support.

parameter.name: baremetalsolution
parameter.shortdesc: If enabled this is a bare metal offering from google.

parameter.name: apitimeout
parameter.shortdesc: Timeout in seconds to use for API calls, default is 60.

parameter.name: retries
parameter.shortdesc: Number of retries on failure for API calls, default is 3.

parameter.name: retrysleep
parameter.shortdesc: Time to sleep in seconds between API retries, default is 5.

parameter.name: serviceaccount
parameter.shortdesc: Service Account to use for authentication to the google cloud APIs.

parameter.name: plugzonemap
parameter.shortdesc: Comma separated zone map when fencing multiple plugs.

parameter.name: proxyhost
parameter.shortdesc: If a proxy is used for internet access, the proxy host should be specified.

parameter.name: proxyport
parameter.shortdesc: If a proxy is used for internet access, the proxy port should be specified.

parameter.name: earlyexit
parameter.shortdesc: If an existing reset operation is detected, the fence agent will return before the operation completes with a 0 return code.

parameter.name: warntimeout
parameter.shortdesc: If the operation is not completed within the timeout, the cluster operations are allowed to continue.

parameter.name: errortimeout
parameter.shortdesc: If the operation is not completed within the timeout, cluster is notified of the operation failure.

parameter.name: runonwarn
parameter.shortdesc: If a timeout would occur while running the agent, then the supplied command is run.

parameter.name: runonfail
parameter.shortdesc: If a failure would occur while running the agent, then the supplied command is run.

parameter.name: quiet
parameter.shortdesc: Disable logging to stderr. Does not affect --verbose or --debug-file or logging to syslog.

parameter.name: verbose
parameter.shortdesc: Verbose mode. Multiple -v flags can be stacked on the command line (e.g., -vvv) to increase verbosity.

parameter.name: verbose_level
parameter.shortdesc: Level of debugging detail in output. Defaults to the number of --verbose flags specified on the command line, or to 1 if verbose=1 in a stonith device configuration (i.e., on stdin).

parameter.name: debug
parameter.shortdesc: Write debug information to given file

parameter.name: debug_file
parameter.shortdesc: Write debug information to given file

parameter.name: version

parameter.name: help
parameter.shortdesc: Display help and exit

parameter.name: plug_separator
parameter.shortdesc: Separator for plug parameter when specifying more than 1 plug

parameter.name: separator
parameter.shortdesc: Separator for CSV created by 'list' operation

parameter.name: delay
parameter.shortdesc: Wait X seconds before fencing is started

parameter.name: disable_timeout
parameter.shortdesc: Disable timeout (true/false) (default: true when run from Pacemaker 2.0+)

parameter.name: login_timeout

parameter.name: power_timeout

parameter.name: shell_timeout

parameter.name: stonith_status_sleep
parameter.shortdesc: Sleep X seconds between status calls during a STONITH action

parameter.name: retry_on
parameter.shortdesc: Count of attempts to retry power on
